title: Google Cloud Platform Learning Path
briefDescription: Master the fundamentals of Google Cloud Platform and build scalable applications.

learningPath.topicBrief: Understand the core concepts of Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including its architecture, services, and pricing models.
Learn how to create, manage, and scale virtual machines on GCP.
Build and deploy scalable web applications without managing servers.
Store and manage data in the cloud with various storage options.
Analyze large datasets with a fully managed serverless data warehouse.
Build and connect cloud services with serverless functions.
Deploy and manage containerized applications on GCP.
Build and manage data pipelines for batch and stream processing.
Build real-time data pipelines and messaging systems.
